rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know there's a
shrine above this, mo?

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently it's been there since
Goldmund was first built, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Now it's old and no one
goes there anymore, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, it's in a place that a normal
Nopon can't get to, so it's outside
Tondon's repair jurisdiction, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Even if it were broken, there's no
need to report it to Tondon, mo.
